Crafted from durable aluminum, the bed lift is designed to withstand the rigors of road travel while ensuring smooth operation. Its 12V/24V compatibility allows seamless integration with your existing camper van electrical system, providing effortless lifting and lowering of your bed.

The Moborv Bed Lift is more than just a platform; it's the foundation for creating a personalized haven in your camper van. Whether you're seeking extra storage space during the day or a comfortable sleeping area at night, this kit empowers you to maximize the potential of your mobile home.

The 2025 Moborv Custom-Made 12V/24V Motorhome Part Camper Van Conversion Kit is designed to seamlessly integrate a bed lift into your camper van conversion, offering both functionality and space optimization.

  • Customizable Design: The kit is built to your specifications, ensuring a perfect fit for your specific camper van model and desired bed dimensions.
  • Dual Voltage Compatibility: Operates on both 12V and 24V systems, accommodating a wide range of motorhome power setups.
  • Aluminum Construction: Lightweight yet durable aluminum ensures longevity and ease of use while maintaining the van's payload capacity.
  • Effortless Lifting Mechanism: The powerful electric lifting system effortlessly raises and lowers the bed platform, providing a convenient and smooth operation.

This comprehensive kit includes all necessary components for installation:

  • Bed Lift Platform Size: Customizable to your requirements.
  • Lifting Capacity: Sufficient to support standard bed sizes and occupants.
  • Power Source: 12V or 24V DC.
  • Control System: Easy-to-use switches for raising and lowering the platform.

The Moborv bed lift system offers numerous advantages for motorhome conversions:

  • Maximized Space Utilization: When raised, the bed clears valuable floor space, allowing for a versatile living area during the day.
  • Enhanced Comfort: The smooth and silent lifting mechanism ensures a comfortable and peaceful sleeping environment.
  • Easy Accessibility: The lowered bed platform provides convenient access to storage compartments underneath.

The 2025 Moborv Custom-Made 12V/24V Motorhome Part Camper Van Conversion Kit is straightforward to operate. Simply use the provided controls to raise or lower the bed platform as needed. The system is designed for both ease of use and safety, ensuring a reliable and enjoyable experience.
